name: @activeadmin-plugins/active_admin_date_range_preset
description: Integrate useful fast links to set date ranges in to ActiveAdmin, for example today range, week range, month range
author: Gena M. <workgena@gmail.com>

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf src && cp -R vendor/assets/javascripts/ src && cp -R vendor/assets/stylesheets/ src
